snippet: Gyorgy Matolcsy, who has spearheaded Hungary’s unorthodox financial policies as economics minister, was appointed as the country’s central bank chief on Friday.
lead_paragraph: Gyorgy Matolcsy, who has spearheaded Hungary’s unorthodox financial policies as economics minister, was appointed as the country’s central bank chief on Friday.

headline.main: Hungary: Prime Minister’s Ally to Run Central Bank
